price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Sε mayera (mpo) a meyera me ara meho, na sε manya kwankyerε nso a εnam deε me Wura Nyankopͻn ayi ama me no so. Nokorε sε, Ɔne Mpaebͻ Tiefoͻ, na Ɔno na Ɔbεn (Na’koa biara).
arabic: قُلۡ إِن ضَلَلۡتُ فَإِنَّمَآ أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِيۖ وَإِنِ ٱهۡتَدَيۡتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِيٓ إِلَيَّ رَبِّيٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٞ قَرِيبٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul in ḍalaltu fa-innamā aḍillu ʿalā nafsī wa-ini ih'tadaytu fabimā yūḥī ilayya rabbī innahu samīʿun qarībun
